name: CyberPong (itch) (Scrapy Ninja)
description:
STILL IN DEVELOPMENT

A re-creation of a classic arcade game, but with a cyberpunk feel. Originally created for GDFG Monthly Jam #15, but was unable to submit in time. Critiques welcome. Thanks.

CONTROLS:

Keyboard:

W/S - Up/Down

Arrow Keys or mouse to navigate menus

Enter or LMB for menu selection

ESC - Pause

Gamepad:

Left Stick Up/Down - Up/Down

Left Stick Left/Right - Left/Right in Menus

Start/Menu Button - Pause

A - Menu Selection

KNOWN BUGS:

-Pause menu not navigable with controller

-If you return to the main menu from the pause menu, the buttons do not function
